name: Jurassic Dinos: T-Rex Rider
description:
Have you always liked dinosaurs? Now a great opportunity to live a fantastic Jurassic adventure comes to your mobile phone with this dinosaurs game!
Choose the dinosaur that you prefer among the four available and run through a Jurassic setting. It won't be easy to dodge all the other dinosaurs!

Watch your back and be careful to not get bitten! There are real dinosaurs chasing you!

Do not let the power bar of your dinosaur get empty and try to maintain the energy bar at its fullest! In this way your game last longer and you will beat all records!

Let your animal instinct guide you and do not let any other dinosaur impact with yours! The super easy controls will help you survive in the world of dinos!0

Features of this Dinosaur game:

◉ Jurassic Environment!
◉ Realistic Dinosaurs World!
◉ Amazing graphics!
◉ Ideal for children (Boys & Girls)!
◉ Crazy Ratings!
◉ Simple controls!
◉ Fun music!
◉ Free Dinosaur Game!

Control these indomitable dinosaurs and run non stop to victory!

We hope you like this game and look forward to receive your comments and ratings!

Enjoy the Dino World!
